attributes.action: holiday companies should keep the same prices during holidays as during term time]#
attributes.additional_details: Are you sick of holiday companies hiking up the price of family holidays during school holidays? I am, especially when you can clearly see a massive price difference in the weeks before and after the school holidays. Now the government have introduced this fine if parents take their children out of school to take them on holiday, are they in cahoots?? Lets make a stand and stop the travel companies charging the earth simply because demand is higher.
